product_overview: Advanced Portfolio Website is a cutting-edge, modern portfolio platform showcasing professional profile, skills, projects, certifications, and blog posts with rich interactive features, animations, accessibility, and performance optimizations to deliver a seamless and engaging user experience across all devices.
core_goals: Showcase professional and personal information with a modern, interactive design
Provide optimized performance including PWA capabilities and SEO best practices
Enable easy navigation with scroll spy, responsive menus, and user feedback systems
Integrate contact capabilities with EmailJS for direct messaging with validation and error handling
Support developer experience with modular, maintainable, and extensible code architecture
key_features: Hero Section with animated introduction, profile image, call-to-action buttons, and social media integration
About Section with skills badges, educational background, and professional experience timeline
Advanced Projects Showcase with real-time search, category filtering, status indicators, and technology tags
Certifications display with achievement badges and verification links
Contact Form powered by EmailJS with validation, error handling, and user feedback
Dark/Light Theme Toggle with system preference detection
Progressive Web App features including offline support and install prompts
SEO optimization using structured data, meta tags, and Open Graph protocol
Mobile-first responsive design including a collapsible mobile menu
Performance monitoring with real-time web vitals tracking and analytics modal
Error boundary for graceful error recovery
Image optimization and lazy loading for improved performance
Notification system for toast messages and user feedback
user_flow_summary: Users land on the Hero Section with animated intro and can quickly access social media and contact form
Users navigate through About, Experience, Skills, Projects, Certifications, Blog, and Testimonials sections via responsive navigation
Users can filter and search projects dynamically in the Advanced Projects section
Users submit messages through the Contact Form with input validation and receive success or error notifications
Users toggle between light and dark themes, either manually or by system preference
Users view professional experience and educational timeline with interactive UI elements
Mobile users access a dedicated mobile menu for smooth navigation
Users benefit from offline capabilities and app-like installation through PWA features
validation_criteria: All components render correctly across supported browsers and devices
PWA offline functionality works as expected with service worker caching
EmailJS integration sends messages reliably with form validation and error handling
Theme toggle respects system preferences and persists user choice
Advanced Projects filters and search update project list in real-time without errors
Performance metrics such as FCP, LCP, CLS are within acceptable thresholds according to Lighthouse CI reports
SEO meta tags, structured data, and sitemap are correctly implemented and valid
Accessibility standards (WCAG) are met with proper semantic HTML and ARIA attributes
Animations and transitions perform smoothly without jank or lag
Error boundaries catch and handle runtime errors gracefully without crashing the app
Notifications display correctly and can be dismissed by users
Analytics tracking accurately records user interactions and page views
